annotations.title: The Camparinha - A Campari Caipirinha cocktail recipe

textContent:
2 oz or 60 ml Campari
1 lime cut in 8 pieces
0.5 oz or 15 ml Simple syrup
0.25 oz or 7.5 ml White agricole rhum

Muddle Lime with Campari
Add rhum and simple syrup
Add crushed ice and stir

title: Camparinha
